divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking my dog at the time and looked in the sky to see a diamond, reflective object that hovered and then twisted to disappear into the sky. i took off running to report it so it would all be fresh as it happened
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granite City
There were no other sightings in Granite City on or around April 19th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: was out on a run with my dog at the exact time and saw a silver, diamond object in the sky
